pages.title: Advanced Condenser
pages.text: Advanced Condensers are similar to the basic condenser, with a few key differences.

The Advanced Condensers can utilize three ingredients to distill into an elixir. As with the basic condenser, water is a requirement for distilling elixirs. The advanced versions also process ingredients at a faster rate.

The Advanced Condensers require Advanced Retorts, instead of regular retorts, and they need three attached to operate. The Advanced Retorts link to the bottom half of the advanced condenser on the left, right, and back sides relative to the direction it is facing.
